title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4603.2 - Period within which to make findings and determination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4603.2 - Period within which to make findings and determination

State Regulations

At least seven days shall elapse between the time the
original application is filed and the time when the municipal governing body
makes its findings and determination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4603.2

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
